name: Jisho DeepDark
description:
Learn japanese in the dark. May the dark be kinder on thine eyes. (jisho dark theme)

This is a dark theme for jisho.org inspired by FT DeepDark.

Also, credit where credit is due for the color palettes. (@KDE, @horst3180, @linuxmint, Firefox, YouTube and Discord)

Official GitHub page, with screenshots and colors, available here.
additional_info: GNU General Public License v3.0 NOTE: This is a theme for the current (2017) site and not the older version and it's forum. You can now install my theme from Github using Stylus. Changelog: 1.0.7 draw button in mobile size 1.0.6 search clear button 1.0.5 inflection table themed 1.0.4 Stylus' *.user.css functionality 1.0.3 added GNU license in the code, added ubuntu colors 1.0.2 added color palettes: black and white, yellow (x2), orange and Jisho 夜明け 1.0.1 fact text fix 1.0.0 initial commit

discussions.name: Awesome stuff, only one small thing
